name: Rotten Flesh
description:
You and your pistol, alone against endless hordes of zombies. You will die, but not without fight.

Rotten Flesh is a simple but brutal 2D top-down zombie shooter game, created to test the possibilities of Pygame.

WASD and mouse to move, LMB to shoot and reload, also R to reload, left shift to run.

CW: gore, death
